AddOnStorageValue.Name: WP Live Chat Support_Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)
AddOnStorageValue.Value: { "Id": "e00ad4df-9045-4c33-b9a7-d12e6bc0a677", "Application": "WP Live Chat Support", "AffectedVersions": [ "<=8.0.07" ], "VulnerabilityName": "Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)", "ExternalReferer": "WPVDB-ID-9085, CVE-2018-11105", "Impact": "Medium", "Note": "There is stored cross site scripting in the wp-live-chat-support plugin before 8.0.08 for WordPress via the "name" (aka wplc_name) and "email" (aka wplc_email) input fields whenever a malicious attacker would initiate a new chat with an administrator." }
